column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: At around 9 .40 pm on December 12
column4: 2019 in front of the Thai embassy on Norodom
column5: a clash between two groups of young men left one dead and one seriously injured.------The victim has not yet been identified.------ Before the incident
column6: a group on four to five motorbikes chased two young men along the road. One side pulled out a pistol and shots were fired.------A K59 pistol was recovered from the scene along with a motorcycle.------After the incident
column7: authorities examined the scene and saved the evidence for further investigation. The exact circumstances surrounding the death are not yet known. ------POST NEWS
